name: Rhaier Kingdom
description:
Rhaier Kingdom will be a Ren'Py Multiplayer Adventure Visual Novel Game.

The great and powerful Rhaier Kingdom is recruiting young people from the villages. They will attend the Royal Academies on Pykkard and, if they succeed, will serve the King and their People as Warriors, Knights, Ambassadors or even Spies.

  • As a Visual Novel there are options, dialogues, characters, and some mystery to solve.
  • As an Adventure there is an Inventory to carry items, a world map and some convoluted conspiracies against the king.
  • As a Multiplayer game there is a message center to talk online to other players. In the future it will be possible to give and receive items, form parties and more.

Download the DEMO now (version 0.3.9; includes a small adventure with 3,389 words). Languages: Spanish (original), English (auto-translated). Currently missing: Sprites, music and sound effects.

How to Update: When getting a message about an update being available, simply re-download the game from this page - it will be the latest version.

Looking for partners: If you are interested on putting your art or music to this project, I'll be thrilled to hear about it. Also, you are welcome if you want to proofread and correct the English version, or proofread the Spanish one. Ideas for more functionality are welcome too. Also, do you have opinions, suggestions, donations? All of it is OK. Thanks!
